channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eric Dane Drops Out of ALS Event Appearance Hours Before 'Due to the Physical Realities' of the Illness
item.description: The actor was not "well enough to attend" the Jan. 24 event, organizers said

item.title: Mel Brooks' Wives: All About His First Marriage to Florence Baum and 'Love at First Sight' Romance with Anne Bancroft
item.description: Mel Brooks wed Anne Bancroft in 1964 and they remained together until her death in 2005

item.title: Scott Foley Says Starring in “Scream 3 ”'Wasn't Considered Real Acting Work' When He Accepted the Role (Exclusive)

item.title: Jay Shetty Says New Podcast with Real-Life Couples Taught Him the ‘Work Is Never Done,’ Even in His Own Marriage (Exclusive)
